body:
* \[[`86f1f53648`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/86f1f53648)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** **chore**: fix confluentinc flaky tests (William Conti) [#5732](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5732)
* \[[`bd378cd6ca`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/bd378cd6ca)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** remove duplicate line in config.spec.js (simon-id) [#5761](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5761)
* \[[`0db1d65cba`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/0db1d65cba)] - **(SEMVER-MINOR)** deprecate serverless mini agent (Duncan Harvey) [#5751](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5751)
* \[[`1c17b9560e`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/1c17b9560e)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** \[test-optimization] \[SDTEST-2039] Remove unnecessary channels in Playwright (Mario Vidal Domínguez) [#5753](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5753)
* \[[`7fc9f261d0`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/7fc9f261d0)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** **test**: rename agent.use() to .assertSomeTraces() (Thomas Hunter II) [#5754](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5754)
* \[[`1faa159781`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/1faa159781)] - **(SEMVER-MINOR)** **tracing**: fix kafka header injection error for older kafka brokers (William Conti) [#5704](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5704)
* \[[`f980b335fe`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/f980b335fe)] - **(SEMVER-MINOR)** instrument the iovalkey package (Thomas Hunter II) [#5555](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5555)
* \[[`0c27678650`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/0c27678650)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** \[DI] Clear state when last probe is removed (Thomas Watson) [#5700](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5700)
* \[[`3aa9147212`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/3aa9147212)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** Safer shimmer implementation (Ruben Bridgewater) [#5632](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5632)
* \[[`232f6f79c0`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/232f6f79c0)] - **(SEMVER-MINOR)** Ignore appsec startup error in serverless (Ugaitz Urien) [#5745](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5745)
* \[[`9fd61730f0`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/9fd61730f0)] - **(SEMVER-MINOR)** Add support for passing tags as arrays for custom metrics (Roch Devost) [#5748](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5748)
* \[[`22d38aaf5d`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/22d38aaf5d)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** Use errorMonitor symbol instead of listening to the error event (Ruben Bridgewater) [#5682](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5682)
* \[[`f1f9a06c56`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/f1f9a06c56)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** \[DI] Fix race condition when applying probe at app boot (Thomas Watson) [#5698](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5698)
* \[[`3f13dee4d6`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/3f13dee4d6)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** Pin with versioned url (TonyCTHsu) [#5741](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5741)
* \[[`f92f2a01c9`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/f92f2a01c9)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** Update default value for appsec.obfuscatorValueRegex config entry (simon-id) [#5739](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5739)
* \[[`295edf4888`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/295edf4888)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** Test sample context propagation through promises too (Attila Szegedi) [#5740](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5740)
* \[[`0672b4d7fc`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/0672b4d7fc)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** fix tag merging logic to update (Sam Brenner) [#5705](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5705)
* \[[`6080e49b98`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/6080e49b98)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** \[test-optimization] \[SDTEST-2024] Fix Playwright exit code status when it fails before running the test (Mario Vidal Domínguez) [#5733](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5733)
* \[[`5ab86f7438`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/5ab86f7438)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** Add an env var for executing integration tests without a sandbox (Attila Szegedi) [#5737](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5737)
* \[[`d1f47c65a7`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/d1f47c65a7)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** report waf results (Ilyas Shabi) [#5655](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5655)
* \[[`3a2ed100eb`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/3a2ed100eb)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** \[DI] Don't fail to trigger if one of multiple probe conditions throws (Thomas Watson) [#5715](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5715)
* \[[`b676e84b13`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/b676e84b13)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** \[DI] Improve error handling during snapshot collection (Thomas Watson) [#5719](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5719)
* \[[`63db106a0b`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/63db106a0b)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** \[test-optimization] \[SDTEST-1990] Make compatible Test Optimization instrumentations with Node 24 (Mario Vidal Domínguez) [#5711](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5711)
* \[[`34f2e55cd7`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/34f2e55cd7)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** \[DI] Use custom error property for errors reporting state snapshot (Thomas Watson) [#5731](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5731)
* \[[`d6382c119f`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/d6382c119f)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** \[DI] Only send probes whos condition is actually met (Thomas Watson) [#5714](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5714)
* \[[`aa76e2a794`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/aa76e2a794)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** \[DI] Clean up code in integration test (Thomas Watson) [#5729](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5729)
* \[[`57da289b7a`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/57da289b7a)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** **docs**: add node v24 warning to README (Thomas Hunter II) [#5724](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5724)
